articles.title: Dutzende Tote durch extreme Kältewelle in den USA
articles.image_title: December 22, 2022, Minneapolis, Minnesota, USA: A pedestrian walks down Nicollet Mall while high winds kick up snow in downtown Minneapolis. The Twin Cities saw 8 inches of snow Wednesday followed by wind gusts up to 50mph and windchills reaching -35 degrees F on Thursday and Friday. A powerful Arctic winter storm is making its way through the US and parts of Canada, bringing with it frigid temperatures and flight delays ahead of the busiest travel days of the year. articles.title: Er wollte den Sex zum populärsten Sport machen
articles.image_title: CANADA - NOVEMBER 27: New Entrant in Millar Will Stork Derby has had 16 children. Mrs. Arthur Hollis Timleck; 14 Sumach St.; Toronto; who claims to have given birth to 16 children; nine of them born since Oct.; 1926; today entered the Charles Vance Millar stork marathon; and announce that she would apply for the half million dollars which; under the late Mr. Millar's will; is to be awarded to the Toronto mother who has given birth to the greatest number of children in the ten years following the barrister's death. [Incomplete] (Photo by Toronto Star Archives/Toronto Star via Getty Images)
